Margin.definition: the difference between net sales and the cost of the merchandise sold from which expenses are usually met or profits derived 2

1.definition: the difference between net sales and the cost of the merchandise sold from which expenses are usually met or profits derived

2.definition: the amount by which the market value of collateral is greater than the face value of a loan

3 a.definition: cash or collateral deposited in a regulated amount by a client with a broker who is financing the purchase of securities see also

sub_terms.b: a deposit made with a broker by a client who is trading in futures
